# Preface {.unnumbered}

This website summarizes the gothamCulture Division of Sport Fisheries (DSF) survey report and the written answers DSF employees provided to to open-ended questions within the same survey.

There are two sections:

-   @sec-summary provides some key output from the DSF report and gothamCulture's recommendations contained within the report along with the Division leadership teams interpretation of the survey results and gothamCulture's recommendations.

-   @sec-text provides a text analysis of the answers DSF employees provided to to open ended questions within survey.
